ability.Dream Weaver: If the opponent is asleep, this Pokemon's special attack x1.5.
ability.Aqua Spirit: This Pokemon's Water-type moves have a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Aqua Veil.effect: Heals the user by 1/4 of the damage dealt.

Fairy Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Mystic Wave.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
